name: Dino Strike
description:
It’s a race for survival in Dino Strike as you blast through jungles filled with prehistoric beasts looking to put you on the endangered species list. Ferocious dinosaurs are not only alive and well, but stalking you at every turn, so stay sharp or you may find it is you who faces extinction!

Features

• Variety of weapons, including: Shotgun, Crossbow and Machine Gun
• Several ferocious species of dinosaurs to defeat, including: Raptor, Pterodactyl, Dilophosaurus, Ankylosaurus, Tyrannosaurus Rex
• Play in single wield mode or dual wield mode and double your firepower
